item.description:
Well the numbers have spoken and we are going to

WING IT!!! We'll meet right in the area outside of Porter Square T Station at 7:30 and we'll take it from there. Hopefully the weather holds out and we do some improv outside and if not we pick somewhere to go for dinner or to just hang out.

Thanks everyone. I'm still working on finding spaces and I am sure we'll have someplace at least on a temporary basis by next week. Sorry for the confusion everyone.

Catcha ya all tonight!

Rock on!

Jason
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the kid always wearing hat and looks way to trendy for his own good...
item.name: Incubator August begins with a Heat Wave @ PORTER SQUARE hopefully with no rain!
